definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">parachutes</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-1.4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">entity.bat.takeoff</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Karen> Intense vertical axis motion detected, activating the parachute.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="item_nbt_logic_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">parachutes</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="play_sound"><field name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><Karen> Desactivating the parachute.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="2"/><value name="IF0"><block name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">InstaKillDesactivate</field></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><field name="procedure">ReturnNearbyThreats</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">InstaKillActivate</field></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health_max"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.3</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure">InstaKillActivate</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
